questions.quote: I said yes, but I don't feel right about it. I mean I hardly know the guy. That's a big step oin a relationship. The biggest. That's like going all the way.
They just don't like me. It's a long story. I can tell you one day but I can't tell you right now.
What you have to do is introduce him, and then he'll just come out with it.

Oh, no please Mr. Peterman, she's crazy!  Crazy for feelings...

You know this whole thing never would have happened if you hadn't bailed out on me at the restaurant.
